You get no discounts on the other days.) For each travel day you activate, the system will generate a separate ticket. You can either view it online, download it as a PDF or add it to your wallet by clicking on one of the red buttons. In case your travel plans change and you want to swap travel dates, there's no need to panic. You can change your mind up until 23:59 of the day before the activated travel day. Please note that same-day deactivations aren't possible. And that's it. You're good to go. How do you use your Swiss Travel Pass? Now that you have your all-inclusive, worry-free, knock-yourself-out ticket all set up, there's nothing holding you back. You can use your Swiss Travel Pass throughout the whole public transport system of Switzerland. This includes all the lines in the so-called " GA Travelcard area of validity ".
